00026 struct ccn_forwarding_entry {
00027     const char *action;
00028     struct ccn_charbuf *name_prefix;
00029     const unsigned char *ccnd_id;
00030     size_t ccnd_id_size;
00031     unsigned faceid;
00032     int flags;
00033     int lifetime;
00034     unsigned char store[48];
00035 };

00037 #define CCN_FORW_ACTIVE         1
00038 #define CCN_FORW_CHILD_INHERIT  2
00039 #define CCN_FORW_ADVERTISE      4
00040 #define CCN_FORW_LAST           8
00041 #define CCN_FORW_CAPTURE       16
00042 #define CCN_FORW_LOCAL         32
00043 #define CCN_FORW_TAP           64
00044 #define CCN_FORW_PUBMASK (CCN_FORW_ACTIVE        | \
00045                           CCN_FORW_CHILD_INHERIT | \
00046                           CCN_FORW_ADVERTISE     | \
00047                           CCN_FORW_LAST          | \
00048                           CCN_FORW_CAPTURE       | \
00049                           CCN_FORW_LOCAL         | \
00050                           CCN_FORW_TAP           )
